title: IoT Workshop: Building Smart Devices with Arduino
description: Hands-on workshop covering IoT fundamentals, sensor integration, and cloud connectivity using Arduino and ESP32 modules.
requirements: Laptop required. Arduino kits will be provided.

title: 5G Technology Seminar
description: Expert seminar on 5G wireless communication technology, network architecture, and future applications.

title: Machine Learning in Signal Processing
description: Technical webinar exploring applications of machine learning techniques in digital signal processing and communications.
requirements: Basic knowledge of signal processing recommended.

title: Circuit Design Competition
description: Annual circuit design competition challenging students to create innovative analog and digital circuit solutions.
requirements: Teams of 2-4 students. Registration deadline: October 25th.

title: Industry Visit: Texas Instruments
description: Educational visit to Texas Instruments facility to learn about semiconductor manufacturing and engineering careers.

title: VLSI Design Fundamentals
description: Comprehensive workshop on VLSI design principles, CAD tools, and chip fabrication processes.

title: Embedded Systems Programming
description: Intensive workshop covering embedded C programming, real-time systems, and microcontroller programming.

title: RF and Microwave Engineering Seminar
description: Advanced seminar on RF circuit design, antenna theory, and microwave applications in modern communications.
